channel.title: Networking on Richard Sumilang
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Richard Sumilang

item.title: Converting Windows Network Path for Mac
item.description: If you’re given a Windows network path such as \\Foo\Bar then that basically means connect to shared folder Bar on the server Foo. To do this, you can go Finder -> Go -> Connect to Server... and type smb://Foo/Bar which is the equivalent.
